statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-38 \, x^{3} + 20 \, x^{2} - 11 \, x + 5 , -9 \, x^{3} + 18 \, x^{2} - 12 \, x - 6 , 2 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 3 , 5 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + x - 1 , -13 \, x^{3} + 10 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
